entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon then southwest 40 gusting to 70. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
